name: MKMapCamera
desc: A virtual camera for defining the appearance of the map.

items.name: init(lookingAtCenter: CLLocationCoordinate2D, fromEyeCoordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D, eyeAltitude: CLLocationDistance)
items.desc: Returns a new camera object using the specified viewing angle information.

items.name: init(lookingAtCenter: CLLocationCoordinate2D, fromDistance: CLLocationDistance, pitch: CGFloat, heading: CLLocationDirection)
items.desc: Returns a new camera object using the specified distance, pitch, and heading information.

items.name: var centerCoordinate: CLLocationCoordinate2D
items.desc: The map coordinate at the center of the map view.

items.name: var heading: CLLocationDirection
items.desc: The heading of the camera (measured in degrees) relative to true north.

items.name: var centerCoordinateDistance: CLLocationDistance
items.desc: The distance from the center point of the map to the camera, measured in meters.

items.name: var pitch: CGFloat
items.desc: The viewing angle of the camera, measured in degrees.
